attributes.action: let the British people have their say on the EU "Reform Treaty" through a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU "Reform Treaty" is the European Constitution by another name and takes forward the process of European integration, transferring more powers from our nation to Brussels.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "let the British people have their say on the EU "Reform Treaty" through a referendum."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14576.asp

Prime Minister's Office
